== Configure Multi Desktops ==

Set Number of Desktops:
  First, open up "Openbox Configuration Manager" under:
    <rightclick on desktop>
    - Applications
      - Preferences
        - Openbox Configuration Manager
  Next, go to desktops tab and set the number of total
    desktops you want, ie for 3x3=9

Set Grid Style Desktops:
  First, install obsetlayout through the AUR

  Next, run this script inside teriminal:

    obsetlayout 0 3 3 0

  Where the grid is 3 x 3.


All Set!
